EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify that Portal Relationship Document Has Been Uploaded
EmailTemplate.name: ET66 - Relationship Document Uploaded
EmailTemplate.subject: *** A Customer has uploaded a Relationship Document - Relationship "{!Account.Name}" ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Organization.Name} Team Member,
A Relationship Document has been uploaded for {!Account.Name}.
Document Name: {!LLC_BI__AccountDocument__c.Name}
Click here for full details: {!Account.Link}.
nCino
ET66
